text: Kogda cheloveka postigayet kakoye-libo bedstviye, on obrashchayetsya k Nam s mol'boy. Kogda zhe My - po Nashey milosti - otvechayem na yego mol'bu i daruyem yemu blago, on govorit: "YA priobrol eti milosti tol'ko blagodarya tomu, chego ya dostig svoim trudom". Etot chelovek ne ponyal, chto delo obstoit ne tak, kak on govorit. Poistine, ta milost', kotoruyu Allakh daroval cheloveku, - ispytaniye, kotoroye vyyavlyayet povinuyushchikhsya i ne povinuyushchikhsya Allakhu. No bol'shinstvo lyudey ne znayet, chto eto ispytaniye i iskusheniye
